text: Kukuyena ukubuyela kwenu nonke isithembiso sikaMvelinqangi siyiqiniso ngempela yena usungula isidalwa bese eyasiphinda ukuze anike umvuzo ngobulungiswa labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezinhle kanye nalabo abangakholwanga okwabo yisiphuzo esingamanzi ashisayo nesijeziso esibuhlungu ngenxa yokuthi babengakholwa
